body:
1) Yes, I'm running with the same command as in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1539#issuecomment-201008522

2) Now bazel test seems to have stopped passing LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the nvcc tests.  Same command, still passing --spawn_strategy=standalone, but now they all fail with

```
ImportError: libcudart.so.7.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```

Maybe the LD_LIBRARY_PATH is being cached at build time or something, I dunno.  I'm trying a clean build now.  I'll post logs if I can make it work again, but basically, most of the tests listed above segfault after outputting "loaded foo.so".
